name: De, shinde burauza no Web gēmu ni risupōn shita
name_original: De, shinde burauza no Web gēmu ni risupōn shita
description:
A point & click adventure game for Wowie Jam 4.0.

You got reincarnated into another strange world after dying with an AI(?) companion.

Graphics by DALL-E mini aka. https://www.craiyon.com/

I've made it in one day really as the original concept was too ambitious and was scrapped :/
